snippet: Wal-Mart, rejecting a safety plan backed by more than a dozen European companies, said its monitors would “conduct in-depth safety inspections” at all factories it uses in Bangladesh.
abstract: Walmart Stores announces its own factory safety plan in Bangladesh, saying its plan is better than broad safety agreement backed by more than a dozen European companies; promises to stop production immediately at factories if urgent safety problems are uncovered and to notify factory owners and governemnt authorities of improvements.
lead_paragraph: Wal-Mart, rejecting a safety plan backed by more than a dozen European companies, said its monitors would “conduct in-depth safety inspections” at all factories it uses in Bangladesh.

headline.seo: Wal-Mart Announces Its Own Factory Safety Plan in Bangladesh
headline.main: As Firms Line Up on Factories, Wal-Mart Plans Solo Effort
headline.print_headline: Wal-Mart Sets A Safety Plan In Bangladesh
